resources.string: Hello player.\n Its time to get acquainted \n with the rules of the game!
You will start the circuit.\n And you will not be left without \n victorious balls in any case.
Achievements are summarized \n and entered into the leaderboard,\nit is located in the "Results".
Each value that will be at \n the moment the circle stops will \n bring you game points.
Start the game \n and set new records!
On easy difficulty,\n you can get the most reward.
On medium difficulty,\n the reward is not very big.
This is for those \n who are not afraid of challenges!\n We know you are one of them!
